alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:32PM PST until January 04 at 1:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes including Aspendell and the White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions due to snow accumulations above 7000 feet. Some chain restrictions may be needed.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
